categories.name: Frontend Applications
categories.description: Templates for building modern web interfaces.
categories.details: Discover templates for React, Vue, and other frontend frameworks to build beautiful user interfaces.

categories.name: Backend Applications
categories.description: Templates for building robust server-side applications.
categories.details: Explore templates for Node.js, Express, NestJS, and other backend frameworks to build powerful APIs.

categories.name: Full Stack Applications
categories.description: Templates for building complete web applications.
categories.details: Find templates for Next.js, Remix, and other full stack frameworks to build end-to-end applications.

categories.name: Monorepo Boilerplate
categories.description: Templates for managing multiple packages in a single repository.
categories.details: Streamline development with monorepo templates using tools like Nx, Turborepo, and Lerna for efficient code sharing.

categories.name: User Acceptance Testing
categories.description: Templates with built-in testing frameworks for end-to-end validation.
categories.details: Ensure your applications meet user requirements with templates featuring Cypress, Playwright, or Selenium for comprehensive testing.

categories.name: Web Extension
categories.description: Templates for building browser extensions and add-ons.
categories.details: Develop cross-browser extensions with templates that support Chrome, Firefox, and Edge with modern web technologies.

templates.name: NestJS Boilerplate
templates.description: A boilerplate for building scalable and maintainable backend applications using NestJS with TypeScript, ESLint, and Prettier.

templates.name: NextJS Starter
templates.description: A production-ready Next.js starter with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and customizable options for rapid full-stack development.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Subdirectory to put all source content (e.g., `src`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g., `@/`

templates.name: Turborepo Boilerplate
templates.description: A modern monorepo boilerplate with Turborepo, TypeScript, Changesets, and Workspaces for efficient multi-package management.

customOptions.name: scope
customOptions.message: Scope to use for the packages, e.g., `@my-org/`

templates.name: React Vite Boilerplate
templates.description: A fast and lightweight React boilerplate with Vite, TypeScript, React Router, and modern tooling for frontend development.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Subdirectory to put all source content (e.g., `src`, `app`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g., `@/`

templates.name: Web Extension React Boilerplate
templates.description: A boilerplate for building WebExtensions with React, Vite, TypeScript, and features like hot module replacement and polyfills.

customOptions.name: srcDir
customOptions.message: Subdirectory to put all source content (e.g., `src`, `app`). Leave blank to use the root directory.

customOptions.name: projectImportPath
customOptions.message: Import alias to use for the project, e.g., `@/`

templates.name: WebdriverIO Boilerplate
templates.description: A comprehensive WebdriverIO boilerplate with TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and Selenoid for automated user acceptance testing.

extensions.name: GitHub Setup
extensions.description: Automate GitHub workflows with Actions, Dependabot, and templates for issues and pull requests.

extensions.name: GitHub Setup for User Acceptance Testing
extensions.description: This extension adds GitHub setup to your project including GitHub Actions, Dependabot, Issue Templates, Pull Request Templates, and more. It also adds a GitHub Action to run User Acceptance Tests using Selenium.

extensions.name: Husky + Lint Staged
extensions.description: Improve code quality with pre-commit hooks using Husky and Lint Staged.

extensions.name: Husky + Lint Staged (Monorepo)
extensions.description: Improve code quality with pre-commit hooks using Husky and Lint Staged for monorepo projects.

extensions.name: Development Container
extensions.description: Set up a development container with Docker and VSCode for consistent environments.

extensions.name: Jest + React Testing Library
extensions.description: Add Jest and React Testing Library for unit and integration testing in React projects.

extensions.name: React i18n
extensions.description: Add internationalization support to your React app with react-i18n and async backend.

extensions.name: TanStack React Query
extensions.description: High-quality open-source software for web developers.

extensions.name: React Hook Form
extensions.description: Extension to add React Hook Form, a performant, flexible and extensible forms with easy-to-use validation.

extensions.name: Recoil.js (Deprecated)
extensions.description: Extension to add Recoil.js, a state management library for React that lets you a data-flow graph that flows from atoms

extensions.name: Jotai
extensions.description: Extension to add Jotai, a small and fast state management library for React

extensions.name: Easy State
extensions.description: Add Easy State, a lightweight state management solution with a simple API and automatic reactivity.

extensions.name: Global State
extensions.description: Add Global State, a minimal state management solution for React applications with global state support.

extensions.name: Hookstate
extensions.description: Add Hookstate, a modern state management solution with hooks-based API and TypeScript support.

extensions.name: MobX
extensions.description: Extension to add MobX, a tiny state management library for React

extensions.name: Teaful
extensions.description: Add Teaful, a tiny and fast state management solution with a simple API and TypeScript support.

extensions.name: Valtio
extensions.description: Extension to add Valtio, a tiny state management library for React

extensions.name: XState
extensions.description: Add XState, a state management and orchestration solution for complex state machines and workflows.

extensions.name: Zustand
extensions.description: Add Zustand, a small, fast and scalable state management solution with a simple API and TypeScript support.

extensions.name: React Redux with Redux Saga
extensions.description: Extension to add the official React bindings for Redux with a fully configured store using Redux Saga

extensions.name: React Redux with Redux Thunk
extensions.description: Extension to add the official React bindings for Redux with a fully configured store using Redux Thunk

extensions.name: Cross Platform Apps with Ionic React + Capacitor
extensions.description: Add Ionic React and Capacitor to your cross platform react app

extensions.name: Docker Compose Setup
extensions.description: Add docker environments for development and production to your project setup with docker-compose

extensions.name: Android Tools
extensions.description: Avoid using heavy IDEs by installing this extension that creates an elegant tool setup for your android app

extensions.name: Semantic UI React
extensions.description: Extension to add Semantic UI React to your setup

extensions.name: Semantic UI React with Theme
extensions.description: Extension to add Semantic UI React to your setup with theme customization

extensions.name: Material UI
extensions.description: Add Material UI components and theming capabilities to your React application with TypeScript support and best practices.

extensions.name: Ant Design for React
extensions.description: Add Ant Design React components with TypeScript support, theming capabilities and enterprise-grade UI patterns.

extensions.name: Bootstrap React
extensions.description: Add Bootstrap React components with TypeScript support and responsive design patterns.

extensions.name: Drizzle ORM SQLite
extensions.description: Add Drizzle ORM with SQLite to your NestJS API with TypeScript support and best practices for database operations.

extensions.description: Add Drizzle ORM with PostgreSQL to your NestJS API with TypeScript support and best practices for database operations.

extensions.description: Add Mongoose ORM with MongoDB to your NestJS API with TypeScript support and best practices for NoSQL database operations.

extensions.description: Extension to add Million DOM Optimization to your React app

extensions.name: React Electron Vite
extensions.description: Add Electron to your cross platform React Vite app

extensions.name: Tailwind CSS
extensions.description: Add Tailwind CSS utility-first styling with PostCSS and dark mode class strategy.

extensions.description: Add shadcn/ui component primitives (Radix UI + Tailwind CSS) with variant-based theming utilities.
